## ShaderHelper.computeFogFactorForType() method

Computes the fog factor with given type for a given view vector

**Signature:**

```typescript
static computeFogFactorForType(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, viewDir: PBShaderExp, fogParams: PBShaderExp, fogType: 'linear' | 'exp' | 'exp2'): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  viewDir | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | the view vector |
|  fogParams | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The fog params \[start, end, top, density\] |
|  fogType | 'linear' \| 'exp' \| 'exp2' | Type of the fog |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The computed fog factor
